name: Anna Karenina
summary_text: In late-19th-century Russian high society, St. Petersburg aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the dashing Count Alexei Vronsky.

name: Into the Blue
summary_text: A group of divers find themselves in deep trouble with a drug lord after they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.

name: Wings
summary_text: Brothers Brian and Joe Hackett attempt to run an airline on the New England island of Nantucket while surrounded by their various wacky friends and employees.

name: Room in Rome
summary_text: A hotel room in the center of Rome serves as the setting for two young and recently acquainted women to have a physical adventure that touches their very souls.

name: The Silence
summary_text: When the world is under attack from terrifying creatures who hunt their human prey by sound, 16-year old Ally Andrews (Kiernan Shipka), who lost her hearing at 13, and her family seek refuge in a remote haven.

name: CSI: NY
summary_text: CSI head Detective Mac Taylor and his team solve crimes using forensic science in New York City.

name: The Boondock Saints
summary_text: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

name: Man with a Plan
summary_text: A dad finds out that parenting is harder than he thought after his wife goes back to work and he's left at home to take care of the kids.

name: Sharpe
summary_text: A series of stories starring Sean Bean as Richard Sharpe, a fictional British soldier in the Napoleonic Wars.

name: Adaptation.
summary_text: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

name: Wanderlust
summary_text: Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple surveys alternative living options, ultimately deciding to experiment with living on a rural commune where free love rules.

name: Heartbeat
summary_text: The 1960s lives and adventures of the police constabulary, medical staff, and residents of Ashfordly and Aidensfield.

name: The Deuce
summary_text: A look at life in New York City during the 1970s and '80s when porn and prostitution were rampant in Manhattan.

name: I Am Not Okay with This
summary_text: Sydney is a teenage girl navigating the trials and tribulations of high school while dealing with the complexities of her family, her budding sexuality, and mysterious superpowers just beginning to awaken deep within her.

name: Dark Skies
summary_text: As the Barrett family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them, one which may have arrived from beyond the stars.

name: Darkest Hour
summary_text: In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler, or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire.

name: Ice Age
summary_text: The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.

name: Hocus Pocus
summary_text: A curious youngster moves to Salem, where he struggles to fit in before awakening a trio of diabolical witches that were executed in the 17th century.

name: Knight Rider
summary_text: A lone crimefighter battles the forces of evil with the help of a virtually indestructible and artificially intelligent supercar.

name: Big Trouble in Little China
summary_text: A rough-and-tumble trucker helps rescue his friend's fiancée from an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.

name: Hellraiser
summary_text: A woman discovers the newly resurrected, partially formed, body of her brother-in-law. She starts killing for him to revitalize his body so he can escape the demonic beings that are pursuing him after he escaped their sadistic underworld.

name: Con Air
summary_text: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

name: Home Economics
summary_text: Three grown-up siblings find themselves living at vastly different levels of financial security from one another.

name: Maniac
summary_text: Two strangers are drawn to a mysterious pharmaceutical trial for a drug that will, they're assured, with no complications or side-effects whatsoever, solve all of their problems permanently. Things do not go as planned.

name: It's a Wonderful Life
summary_text: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

name: My Cousin Vinny
summary_text: Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.

name: Silent Hill
summary_text: A woman, Rose, goes in search for her adopted daughter within the confines of a strange, desolate town called Silent Hill.

name: Never Back Down
summary_text: A frustrated and conflicted teenager arrives at a new high school to discover an underground fight club and meet a classmate who begins to coerce him into fighting.

name: How to Be Single
summary_text: A group of young adults navigate love and relationships in New York City.

name: Bosom Buddies
summary_text: Two young single ad men must disguise themselves as women to live in the one apartment they can afford.

name: Gremlins
summary_text: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

name: Elite Short Stories: Omar Ander Alexis
summary_text: Now in remission, Ander is set on spending his summer helping Alexis, his chemo partner, go through treatment.

name: The Mule
summary_text: A ninety-year-old horticulturist and Korean War veteran turns drug mule for a Mexican cartel.

name: Young Guns
summary_text: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

name: Roswell, New Mexico
summary_text: Centers on a town where aliens with unearthly abilities live undercover among humans. But when a violent attack points to a greater alien presence, the politics of fear and hatred threaten to expose them.

name: Queen of Hearts
summary_text: A successful lawyer jeopardizes her career and threatens to tear her family apart after engaging in an affair with her teenage stepson.

name: Love, Rosie
summary_text: Rosie and Alex have been best friends since they were 5, so they couldn't possibly be right for one another...or could they? When it comes to love, life and making the right choices, these two are their own worst enemies.

name: Jay and Silent Bob Reboot
summary_text: Jay and Silent Bob inadvertently sign away their names and rights to the new Bluntman and Chronic movie. Now they head to Hollywood to stop the film from being made. Along the way Jay discovers that he is a father.

name: Wall Street
summary_text: A young and impatient stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless and greedy corporate raider who takes the youth under his wing.

name: The Big Chill
summary_text: A group of seven former college friends gather for a week-end reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

name: Bad Moms
summary_text: When three overworked and under-appreciated moms are pushed beyond their limits, they ditch their conventional responsibilities for a jolt of long overdue freedom, fun and comedic self-indulgence.

name: Friday the 13th
summary_text: A group of young adults visit a boarded up campsite named Crystal Lake where they soon encounter the mysterious Jason Voorhees and his deadly intentions.

name: MacGyver
summary_text: The adventures of a secret Agent armed with almost infinite scientific resourcefulness.

name: Amar
summary_text: Laura and Carlos love each other as if every day was the last, and perhaps that first love intensity is what will tear them apart a year later.

name: The Last of Us: Part II
summary_text: Five years after the events of The Last of Us, Ellie embarks on another journey through a post-apocalyptic America on a mission of vengeance against a mysterious militia.

name: Hitman
summary_text: A gun-for-hire known only as Agent 47 hired by a group known only as 'The Organization' is ensnared in a political conspiracy, which finds him pursued by both Interpol and the Russian military as he treks across Russia and Eastern Europe.

name: Ballers
summary_text: A series centered around a group of football players and their families, friends and handlers.

name: War Horse
summary_text: Young Albert enlists to serve in World War I after his beloved horse is sold to the cavalry. Albert's hopeful journey takes him out of England and to the front lines as the war rages on.

name: Minions
summary_text: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

name: Green Room
summary_text: A punk rock band is forced to fight for survival after witnessing a murder at a neo-Nazi skinhead bar.

name: Untitled David O. Russell
summary_text: Plot details kept under wraps.

name: Hoosiers
summary_text: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

name: The Expendables 3
summary_text: Barney augments his team with new blood for a personal battle: to take down Conrad Stonebanks, the Expendables co-founder and notorious arms trader who is hell bent on wiping out Barney and every single one of his associates.

name: Mildred Pierce
summary_text: Divorced single mom Mildred Pierce decides to open a restaurant business, which tears at the already-strained relationship with her ambitious elder daughter, Veda.

name: Back to the Future Part III
summary_text: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.

name: Grace
summary_text: Brighton-based Detective Superintendent Roy Grace, a hard-working police officer who has given his life to the job.

name: District 9
summary_text: Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.

name: The Murders at White House Farm
summary_text: Revolves around the true story of a fateful night in August 1985 when five members of the same family are murdered at an Essex farmhouse, and the ensuing police investigation and court case that follows.

name: Mission: Impossible
summary_text: An elite covert operations unit carries out highly sensitive missions subject to official denial in the event of failure, death or capture.

name: Versailles
summary_text: In 1667, 28-year-old all-powerful king of France, Louis XIV, decides to build the greatest palace in the world - Versailles. But drained budget, affairs and political intrigues complicate things.

name: True Lies
summary_text: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

name: Crawl
summary_text: A young woman, while attempting to save her father during a category 5 hurricane, finds herself trapped in a flooding house and must fight for her life against alligators.

name: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
summary_text: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

name: Long Shot
summary_text: Journalist Fred Flarsky reunites with his childhood crush, Charlotte Field, now one of the most influential women in the world. As she prepares to make a run for the Presidency, Charlotte hires Fred as her speechwriter and sparks fly.

name: My Octopus Teacher
summary_text: A filmmaker forges an unusual friendship with an octopus living in a South African kelp forest, learning as the animal shares the mysteries of her world.

name: Original Sin
summary_text: A woman, along with her lover, plans to con a rich man by marrying him, earning his trust, and then running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she falls in love with him.

name: The Bank Job
summary_text: Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry along with a treasure trove of dirty secrets.

name: Fighting with My Family
summary_text: A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.

name: Buddy Games
summary_text: A group of friends reunite to play The Buddy Games, a wild assortment of absurd physical and mental challenges. In the process, they'll heal old wounds, right past wrongs and figure out the true meaning of friendship...or die trying.

name: Insomnia
summary_text: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

name: Vertigo
summary_text: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

name: The Fault in Our Stars
summary_text: Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.

name: The Babysitter: Killer Queen
summary_text: Two years after Cole survived a satanic blood cult, he's living another nightmare: high school. And the demons from his past? Still making his life hell.

name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
summary_text: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

name: Your Highness
summary_text: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

name: Old School
summary_text: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.

name: Human: The World Within
summary_text: Diverse personal stories from around the world reveal how lives, passions and goals are facilitated by the human body's various complex systems; narrator Jad Abumrad.

name: Insidious: Chapter 2
summary_text: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

name: The Cosby Show
summary_text: The goings-on in the life of a successful African-American family.

name: Welcome Home
summary_text: A couple spend a weekend at a vacation rental home in the Italian countryside in an attempt to repair their relationship, but soon become victims of the homeowner's sinister plans.

name: Young Rock
summary_text: A look at the formative years of superstar Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson as he grows up through life.

name: Hush
summary_text: A deaf and mute writer who retreated into the woods to live a solitary life must fight for her life in silence when a masked killer appears at her window.

name: Empire Records
summary_text: Twenty-four hours in the lives of the young employees at Empire Records when they all grow up and become young adults thanks to each other and the manager. They all face the store joining a chain store with strict rules.

name: Vice
summary_text: The story of Dick Cheney, an unassuming bureaucratic Washington insider, who quietly wielded immense power as Vice President to George W. Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways that we still feel today.

name: Orphan: First Kill
summary_text: A prequel to the 2009 movie "Orphan."

name: The Power
summary_text: 1974: a young nurse is forced to work the night shift in a crumbling hospital as striking miners switch off the power across Britain. But inside the walls lurks a terrifying presence that threatens to consume her and everyone around her.

name: Coyote Ugly
summary_text: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

name: Killer Joe
summary_text: When a debt puts a young man's life in danger, he turns to putting a hit out on his evil mother in order to collect the insurance.

name: Disobedience
summary_text: A woman returns to her Orthodox Jewish community that shunned her for her attraction to a female childhood friend. Once back, their passions reignite as they explore the boundaries of faith and sexuality.

name: All the Bright Places
summary_text: The story of Violet and Theodore, who meet and change each other's lives forever. As they struggle with the emotional and physical scars of their past, they discover that even the smallest places and moments can mean something.

name: Lethal Weapon
summary_text: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

name: Hulk
summary_text: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

name: The Machinist
summary_text: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

name: Lego Masters
summary_text: LEGO enthusiasts participate in a series of competitions that begin with a single LEGO brick and concludes with inspiring, complex constructions.

name: Miss Congeniality
summary_text: An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

name: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
summary_text: Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF.

name: Scream: The TV Series
summary_text: A serialized anthology series that follows a group of teenagers being targeted by a masked serial killer.

name: Game Night
summary_text: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves entangled in a real-life mystery when the shady brother of one of them is seemingly kidnapped by dangerous gangsters.

name: The Watch
summary_text: Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.

name: The Mindy Project
summary_text: A young Ob/Gyn doctor balances her personal and professional life, surrounded by quirky co-workers in a small office.

name: What I Like About You
summary_text: When Holly's father is transferred to Japan, she is sent to live with her big sister Valerie in New York City, turning Valerie's life upside down.

name: The Dictator
summary_text: The heroic story of a dictator who risked his life to ensure that democracy would never come to the country he so lovingly oppressed.

name: Relic
summary_text: A daughter, mother and grandmother are haunted by a manifestation of dementia that consumes their family's home.

name: Army of Darkness
summary_text: A sardonic hardware store clerk is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must retrieve the Necronomicon and battle an army of the dead so he can return home.

name: The Toxic Avenger
summary_text: Tromaville has a monstrous new hero. The Toxic Avenger is born when meek mop boy Melvin falls into a vat of toxic waste. Now evildoers will have a lot to lose.

name: Red Dawn
summary_text: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

name: Sweet Home
summary_text: Hyun, a loner high school student who lost his entire family in a terrible accident, is forced to leave his home and has to face a new reality where monsters are trying to wipe out all of humanity. Now he must fight against all odds to try and race against the clock to save what is left of the human race before it's too late.

name: The Ninth Gate
summary_text: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

name: Friday the 13th
summary_text: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which was the site of a child's drowning and a grisly double murder years before.

name: Life of Pi
summary_text: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
summary_text: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

name: All Rise
summary_text: A look at the personal and professional lives of the judges, lawyers, clerks, bailiffs and cops who work at an L.A. County courthouse.

name: The White Tiger
summary_text: An ambitious Indian driver uses his wit and cunning to escape from poverty and rise to the top. An epic journey based on the New York Times bestseller.

name: Dr. No
summary_text: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

name: The Waterboy
summary_text: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

name: Immortals
summary_text: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

name: 12 Strong
summary_text: 12 Strong tells the story of the first Special Forces team deployed to Afghanistan after 9/11; under the leadership of a new captain, the team must work with an Afghan warlord to take down the Taliban.

name: The Road
summary_text: In a dangerous post-apocalyptic world, an ailing father defends his son as they slowly travel to the sea.

name: Hunter Hunter
summary_text: Joseph and his family live in the remote wilderness as fur trappers, but their tranquility is threatened when they think they are being hunted by the return of a rogue wolf, and Joseph leaves them behind to track it.

name: Ally McBeal
summary_text: Follows the personal and professional life of lawyer Ally.

name: Basic Instinct 2
summary_text: Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.

name: Blood Diamond
summary_text: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

name: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
summary_text: In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, science fiction, and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.

name: Sleepy Hollow
summary_text: Ichabod Crane is resurrected and pulled two and a half centuries through time to unravel a mystery that dates all the way back to the founding fathers.

name: The Conners
summary_text: Follow-up to the comedy series Roseanne (1988), centering on the family members of the matriarch after her sudden death.

name: Last Christmas
summary_text: Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Working as an elf in a year round Christmas store is not good for the wannabe singer. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn. For Kate, it seems too good to be true.

name: Long Story Short
summary_text: Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that every few minutes he's jumping forward to the next year of his life.

name: Southpaw
summary_text: After a fatal incident sends him on a rampant path of destruction, a champion boxer fights to get custody of his daughter and revive his professional career.

name: Wayne
summary_text: Wayne, a 16 year-old Dirty Harry with a heart of gold, sets out on a small two stroke road bike from Boston to Florida with his new friend Del to get back the shit-hot 79' Trans-Am that was stolen from his father before he died.

name: Iron Mask
summary_text: Early 1700: Cartographer Jonathan Green (Jason Flemyng) from Viy (2014) is back to map the Russian Far East. He's forced on to China, where he confronts the Dragon Master et al. The iron masked Russian Czar escapes the Tower of London to a Russian ship.

name: Weeds
summary_text: When a suburban mother turns to dealing marijuana in order to maintain her privileged lifestyle after her husband dies, she finds out just how addicted her entire neighborhood already is.

name: What Happened to Monday
summary_text: In a world where families are limited to one child due to overpopulation, a set of identical septuplets must avoid being put to a long sleep by the government and dangerous infighting while investigating the disappearance of one of their own.

name: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
summary_text: A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.

name: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
summary_text: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

name: Invasion
summary_text: TV Series inspired by HG Wells' 'War of the Worlds'.

name: The Bill
summary_text: Uniform officers and detectives from an inner London police station enforce law and order on a day to day basis.

name: Paradise City
summary_text: The lives of a rock star who seems to have it all and a young rookie kid who idolizes him collide through their broken homes built by the music business.

name: Leaving Las Vegas
summary_text: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

name: McDonald & Dodds
summary_text: A shy and enigmatic Detective Sergeant is partnered with a wildly ambitious Detective Chief Inspector to solve crimes in the historic city of Bath.

name: Carol
summary_text: An aspiring photographer develops an intimate relationship with an older woman in 1950s New York.

name: Olympus Has Fallen
summary_text: Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

name: Jungleland
summary_text: Two brothers try to escape their circumstances by travelling across the country for a no holds barred boxing match that becomes a fight for their lives.

name: The Munsters
summary_text: A family of friendly monsters have misadventures, never quite understanding why people react to them so strangely.

name: Flashdance
summary_text: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.

name: St. Elsewhere
summary_text: The lives and work of the staff of St. Eligius Hospital, an old and disrespected Boston teaching hospital.

name: Jupiter Ascending
summary_text: A young woman discovers her destiny as an heiress of intergalactic nobility and must fight to protect the inhabitants of Earth from an ancient and destructive industry.

name: Apollo 13
summary_text: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

name: Britannia
summary_text: In 43 AD, the Roman Army returns to crush the Celtic heart of Britannia.

name: Good Morning, Vietnam
summary_text: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

name: In Bruges
summary_text: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

name: The Meddler
summary_text: An aging widow from New York City follows her daughter to Los Angeles in hopes of starting a new life after her husband passes away.

name: Sex Tape
summary_text: A married couple wake up to discover that the sex tape they made the evening before has gone missing, leading to a frantic search for its whereabouts.

name: Melancholia
summary_text: Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.

name: Scary Movie 2
summary_text: Four teens are tricked by Professor Oldman (Tim Curry) into visiting a haunted house for a school project.

name: Dynasty
summary_text: The trials and tribulations of two feuding families, the Carringtons and the Colbys, both oil rich families in Denver, Colorado.

name: The English Patient
summary_text: At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

name: American Traitor: The Trial of Axis Sally
summary_text: AMERICAN TRAITOR: THE TRIAL OF AXIS SALLY follows the life of American woman Mildred Gillars (Meadow Williams) and her lawyer (Al Pacino), who struggles to redeem her reputation.

name: Cars 3
summary_text: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

name: The French Connection
summary_text: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.

name: R.I.P.D.
summary_text: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.

name: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
summary_text: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family.

name: Dangal
summary_text: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

name: Scarlett
summary_text: A college student must draw upon all the skills her spy-father taught her to protect herself and save her father from weapons dealers.

name: Erased
summary_text: 29-year-old Satoru Fujinuma is sent back in time 18 years to prevent the events leading to his mother's death, which began with a series of kidnappings while he was in 5th grade.

name: Death Becomes Her
summary_text: When a woman learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

name: Just Mercy
summary_text: World-renowned civil rights defense attorney Bryan Stevenson works to free a wrongly condemned death row prisoner.

name: Last Action Hero
summary_text: With the help of a magic ticket, a young movie fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action movie character.

name: Moon
summary_text: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

name: Cool Hand Luke
summary_text: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

name: Vikings: Valhalla
summary_text: Follow-up series to 'Vikings' set 100 years afterward and centering on the adventures of Leif Erikson, Freydis, Harald Hardrada and the Norman King William the Conqueror.

name: Singin' in the Rain
summary_text: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

name: Donnie Brasco
summary_text: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

name: Demolition Man
summary_text: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

name: Imposters
summary_text: A dark comedy that focuses on a female con artist who marries people and then disappears with their money.

name: Mary Queen of Scots
summary_text: Mary Stuart's (Saoirse Ronan's) attempt to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I (Margot Robbie), Queen of England, finds her condemned to years of imprisonment before facing execution.

name: Dead Silence
summary_text: A young widower returns to his hometown to search for answers to his wife's murder, which may be linked to the ghost of a deceased ventriloquist.

name: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
summary_text: As an asteroid nears Earth, a man finds himself alone after his wife leaves in a panic. He decides to take a road trip to reunite with his high school sweetheart. Accompanying him is a neighbor who inadvertently puts a wrench in his plan.

name: Locked Down
summary_text: A couple attempts a high-risk, high-stakes jewelry heist at a department store.

name: Power Rangers Dino Fury
summary_text: When an army of powerful alien beings is unleashed on Earth threatening life as we know it, a brand-new team of Power Rangers, fueled by the prehistoric power of the dinosaurs, are recruited to deal with the threat.

name: Patriot
summary_text: Follows the complicated life of intelligence officer John Tavner, whose latest assignment - to prevent Iran from going nuclear - requires him to forgo all safety nets and assume a perilous non-official cover.

name: Disenchantment
summary_text: Princess Tiabeanie, 'Bean', is annoyed at her imminent arranged marriage to Prince Merkimer. Then she meets Luci, a demon, and Elfo, an elf, and things get rather exciting, and dangerous.

name: The Founder
summary_text: The story of Ray Kroc, a salesman who turned two brothers' innovative fast food eatery, McDonald's, into the biggest restaurant business in the world, with a combination of ambition, persistence, and ruthlessness.

name: The United States vs. Billie Holiday
summary_text: Follows Holiday during her career as she is targeted by the Federal Department of Narcotics with an undercover sting operation led by black Federal Agent Jimmy Fletcher, with whom she had a tumultuous affair.

name: Captain America
summary_text: Frozen in the ice for decades, Captain America is freed to battle against archcriminal The Red Skull.

name: Happiest Season
summary_text: A holiday romantic comedy that captures the range of emotions tied to wanting your family's acceptance, being true to yourself, and trying not to ruin Christmas.

name: The Jungle Book
summary_text: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther Bagheera and free-spirited bear Baloo.

name: Maze Runner: The Death Cure
summary_text: Young hero Thomas embarks on a mission to find a cure for a deadly disease known as "The Flare".

name: The East
summary_text: A young Dutch soldier deployed to suppress post-WWII independence efforts in the Netherlands' colony of Indonesia finds himself torn between duty and conscience when he joins an increasingly ruthless commander's elite squad.

name: The Heartbreak Kid
summary_text: A newly wed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon.

name: Superwog
summary_text: A half-hour comedy following the dysfunctional Superwog family. While their parents deal with a marital breakdown, Superwog and best friend Johnny must learn to deal with adulthood and independent life.

name: Ingrid Goes West
summary_text: An unhinged social media stalker moves to LA and ingratiates herself into the life of an Instagram star.

name: Cinderella
summary_text: A modern musical version of the classic fairy tale "Cinderella".

name: Raw
summary_text: A young woman, studying to be a vet, develops a craving for human flesh.

name: Sistas
summary_text: A group of single black females from different walks of life who bond over their one common thread: why am I single?

name: Gattaca
summary_text: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

name: You Were Never Really Here
summary_text: A traumatized veteran, unafraid of violence, tracks down missing girls for a living. When a job spins out of control, Joe's nightmares overtake him as a conspiracy is uncovered leading to what may be his death trip or his awakening.

name: Lost Girls and Love Hotels
summary_text: Haunted by her past, an English teacher explores love and dust with a dashing yakuza gangster in Tokyo.

name: Rutherford Falls
summary_text: A small town in the Northeast is turned upside down when local legend and town namesake, Nathan Rutherford (Ed Helms) fights the moving of a historical statue.

name: Saw II
summary_text: A detective and his team must rescue 8 people trapped in a factory by the twisted serial killer known as Jigsaw.

name: The Secret in Their Eyes
summary_text: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

name: 9 Songs
summary_text: In London, intense sexual encounters take place between an American college student, named Lisa, and an English scientist, named Matt, between attending rock concerts.

name: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
summary_text: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

name: Downton Abbey 2
summary_text: Follow-up to the 2019 feature film in which the Crawley family and Downton staff received a royal visit from the King and Queen of Great Britain.

name: War for the Planet of the Apes
summary_text: After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind.

name: Sabotage
summary_text: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

name: Homicide: Life on the Street
summary_text: Life on the Street is an American police procedural television series chronicling the work of a fictional version of the Baltimore Police Department's Homicide Unit.

name: Code 8
summary_text: A super-powered construction worker falls in with a group of criminals in order to raise the funds to help his ill mother.

name: Pacific Rim
summary_text: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

name: The School for Good and Evil
summary_text: A group of boys and girls are taken to an institution where they are trained to become fairy tale-like heroes and villains.

name: The Killing of Two Lovers
summary_text: David desperately tries to keep his family of six together during a separation from his wife. They both agree to see other people but David struggles to grapple with his wife's new relationship.

name: Some Like It Hot
summary_text: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

name: Quantico
summary_text: A look at the lives of young FBI recruits training at the Quantico base in Virginia when one of them is suspected of being a sleeper terrorist.

name: DCI Banks
summary_text: The tenacious and stubborn DCI Banks unravels disturbing murder mysteries aided by his young assistants, DS Annie Cabbot and DI Helen Morton.

name: Future Man
summary_text: Josh Futturman, a janitor by day and a gamer by night, is recruited by mysterious visitors to travel through time to prevent the extinction of humanity.

name: But I'm a Cheerleader
summary_text: A naive teenager is sent to rehab camp when her straitlaced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian.

name: Keeping Up with the Joneses
summary_text: A suburban couple becomes embroiled in an international espionage plot when they discover that their seemingly perfect new neighbors are government spies.

name: I Know This Much Is True
summary_text: Following the parallel lives of identical twin brothers Dominick and Thomas Birdsey in a story of betrayal, sacrifice and forgiveness.

name: Happy!
summary_text: An injured hitman befriends his kidnapped daughter's imaginary friend - a perky blue flying unicorn.

name: Commando
summary_text: A retired Special Forces colonel tries to save his daughter, who was abducted by his former subordinate.

name: All My Children
summary_text: Set in the fictional East Coast suburb Pine Valley, this show is the decades-old, risk-taking soap that centers around Erica Kane and her long line of husbands.

name: One Day at a Time
summary_text: The misadventures of a divorced mother, her family, and their building superintendent in Indianapolis.

name: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
summary_text: Through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a German concentration camp, a forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.

name: Wicked
summary_text: The story of how a green-skinned woman framed by the Wizard of Oz becomes the Wicked Witch of the West; feature film based on the Broadway musical.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
summary_text: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.

name: TRON: Legacy
summary_text: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

name: Mrs. Fletcher
summary_text: A single mom whose son has moved out for college looks to begin a new life on her own.

name: Home and Away
summary_text: This show chronicles the lives, loves, happiness, and heartbreaks of the residents of Summer Bay, a small coastal town just outside of Sydney, New South Wales, Australia.

name: National Treasure
summary_text: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
summary_text: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

name: Ófærð
summary_text: In a remote town in Iceland, Police desperately try to solve a crime as a powerful storm descends upon the town.

name: So I Married an Axe Murderer
summary_text: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment suspects his girlfriend may have a knack for killing off her significant others.

name: What Lies Below
summary_text: A 16 year-old girl returns home from camp and learns that her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry. A man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.

name: Trust
summary_text: In this sexy and twisty ride, New York gallery owner Brooke and her husband Owen each face exceptional temptations, with most unexpected results.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
summary_text: Sequel to the 2020 live-action feature film 'Sonic the Hedgehog'.

name: One Day at a Time
summary_text: Follows three generations of the same Cuban-American family living in the same house: a newly divorced former military mother, her teenage daughter and tween son, and her old-school mother.

name: I Know What You Did Last Summer
summary_text: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

name: The Whole Nine Yards
summary_text: A struggling dentist's life is turned upside down when a famous gangster moves in next door, and his wife convinces him to inform a notorious mob boss about the gangster's whereabouts.

name: The Mask of Zorro
summary_text: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

name: Saw: The Final Chapter
summary_text: As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror.

name: Reckoning
summary_text: Explores the darkest corners of the male psyche through the eyes of two fathers, one of whom is a serial-killer.

name: Underworld: Blood Wars
summary_text: Vampire death dealer Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.

name: Growing Pains
summary_text: The misadventures of a family with a home business father and a journalist mother.

name: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
summary_text: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

name: 27 Dresses
summary_text: After serving as a bridesmaid 27 times, a young woman wrestles with the idea of standing by her sister's side as her sibling marries the man she's secretly in love with.

name: Hubie Halloween
summary_text: Despite his devotion to his hometown of Salem (and its Halloween celebration), Hubie Dubois is a figure of mockery for kids and adults alike. But this year, something is going bump in the night, and it's up to Hubie to save Halloween.

name: Asur: Welcome to Your Dark Side
summary_text: A unique crime thriller that pits two opposing worlds against each other. The less explored, intricate world of forensic science and the deep mysticism of ancient Indian Mythology.

name: The Punisher
summary_text: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.

name: Up in the Air
summary_text: Ryan Bingham enjoys living out of a suitcase for his job, travelling around the country firing people, but finds that lifestyle threatened by the presence of a potential love interest, and a new hire presenting a new business model.

name: Dota: Dragon's Blood
summary_text: After encounters with a dragon and a princess on her own mission, a Dragon Knight becomes embroiled in events larger than he could have ever imagined.

name: Miss Sloane
summary_text: In the high-stakes world of political power-brokers, Elizabeth Sloane is the most sought after and formidable lobbyist in D.C. But when taking on the most powerful opponent of her career, she finds winning may come at too high a price.
